panels.description: Returns a switch when 100% of the probes have failed during the last 15 minutes. It excludes site which have been put into GMX maintenance mode.
panels.title: Switches down

panels.description: Returns a node where 100% of probes have failed during the last 15 minutes. It excludes nodes which have been put into GMX maintenance mode.

targets.expr:
(label_replace(sum_over_time(probe_success{service="ssh806", module="ssh_v4_online"}[15m]) == 0,
	"site", "$1", "machine", "mlab[1-4].([a-z]{3}[0-9tc]{2}).*")) unless on(machine) gmx_machine_maintenance == 1 unless on(site) gmx_site_maintenance == 1

panels.title: Nodes down

targets.expr:
count(
  probe_success{service="ndt_ssl"} AND ON(machine)
    up{service="nodeexporter"} == 1 UNLESS ON(machine)
    lame_duck_node{} == 1 AND ON(machine)
    probe_success{service="ndt_ssl"} == 1 AND ON(machine)
    probe_success{service="ndt_raw"} == 1 AND ON(machine)
    script_success{service="ndt_e2e"} == 1 AND ON(machine)
    vdlimit_used{experiment="ndt.iupui"} / vdlimit_total{experiment="ndt.iupui"} < 0.95
)
/
count(
  probe_success{service="ndt_ssl"} AND ON(machine)
    up{service="nodeexporter"} == 1 UNLESS ON(machine)
    lame_duck_node{} == 1
)

count(
  probe_success{service="ndt_ssl"} AND ON(machine)
    up{service="nodeexporter"} == 1 UNLESS ON(machine)
    lame_duck_node{} == 1 AND ON(machine)
    probe_success{service="ndt_ssl"} == 1 AND ON(machine)
    probe_success{service="ndt_raw"} == 1 AND ON(machine)
    script_success{service="ndt_e2e"} == 1 AND ON(machine)
    vdlimit_used{experiment="ndt.iupui"} / vdlimit_total{experiment="ndt.iupui"} < 0.95
)

scalar(count(
  probe_success{service="ndt_ssl"} AND ON(machine)
    up{service="nodeexporter"} == 1 UNLESS ON(machine)
    lame_duck_node{} == 1
  UNLESS ON(machine) (
    probe_success{service="ndt_ssl"} == 1 AND ON(machine)
    probe_success{service="ndt_raw"} == 1 AND ON(machine)
    script_success{service="ndt_e2e"} == 1 AND ON(machine)
    vdlimit_used{experiment="ndt.iupui"} / vdlimit_total{experiment="ndt.iupui"} < 0.95
  )
))

panels.description: Returns a machine which has been put into GMX maintenance mode.
panels.title: Nodes in GMX maintenance mode

panels.description: Returns a site which has been put into GMX maintenance mode.
panels.title: Sites in GMX maintenance mode

panels.description:
Returns a node which has been rebooted by Rebot during the last 24 hours.

TODO: use $__range after we upgrade to Grafana >v5.3
panels.title: Rebot - Rebooted in the last 24h

targets.expr:
scalar(count(
  probe_success{service="ndt_ssl"} AND ON(machine)
      up{service="nodeexporter"} == 1 UNLESS ON(machine)
      lame_duck_node{} == 1
    UNLESS ON(machine) (
      probe_success{service="ndt_ssl"} == 1 AND ON(machine)
      probe_success{service="ndt_raw"} == 1 AND ON(machine)
      script_success{service="ndt_e2e"} == 1 AND ON(machine)
      vdlimit_used{experiment="ndt.iupui"} / vdlimit_total{experiment="ndt.iupui"} < 0.8
    )
))

probe_success{service="ndt_ssl"} AND ON(machine)
    up{service="nodeexporter"} == 1 UNLESS ON(machine)
    lame_duck_node{} == 1
  UNLESS ON(machine) (
    probe_success{service="ndt_ssl"} == 1 AND ON(machine)
    probe_success{service="ndt_raw"} == 1 AND ON(machine)
    script_success{service="ndt_e2e"} == 1 AND ON(machine)
    vdlimit_used{experiment="ndt.iupui"} / vdlimit_total{experiment="ndt.iupui"} < 0.8
  )

scalar(count(
  probe_success{service="ndt_ssl"} == 0 AND ON(machine)
      up{service="nodeexporter"} == 1 UNLESS ON(machine)
      lame_duck_node{} == 1
))

scalar(count(
  probe_success{service="ndt_raw"} == 0 AND ON(machine)
      up{service="nodeexporter"} == 1 UNLESS ON(machine)
      lame_duck_node{} == 1
))

scalar(count(
  script_success{service="ndt_e2e"} == 0 AND ON(machine)
      up{service="nodeexporter"} == 1 UNLESS ON(machine)
      lame_duck_node{} == 1
))

scalar(count(
  vdlimit_used{experiment="ndt.iupui"} / vdlimit_total{experiment="ndt.iupui"} > 0.8 AND ON(machine)
    up{service="nodeexporter"} == 1 UNLESS ON(machine)
    lame_duck_node{} == 1
))

scalar(count(
  script_success{service="ndt_queue"} == 0 AND ON(machine)
    script_exit_code{} == 5 AND ON(machine)
    up{service="nodeexporter"} == 1
))

script_success{service="ndt_queue"} == 0 AND ON(machine)
  script_exit_code{} == 5 AND ON(machine)
  up{service="nodeexporter"} == 1

probe_success{service="ndt_ssl", machine=~".*$site.*"} AND ON(machine)
  up{service="nodeexporter"} == 1 UNLESS ON(machine)
  lame_duck_node{} == 1

probe_success{service="ndt_raw", machine=~".*$site.*"} AND ON(machine)
  up{service="nodeexporter"} == 1 UNLESS ON(machine)
  lame_duck_node{} == 1

script_success{service="ndt_e2e", machine=~".*$site.*"} AND ON(machine)
  up{service="nodeexporter"} == 1 UNLESS ON(machine)
  lame_duck_node{} == 1

$site:  % of time spent doing Disk IO (sec/sec)
